name: Caldwell - Lost and Found - One Night Stand - Robusto
brand: Caldwell, Lost and Found, One Night Stand
additionalNotes: The Caldwell Lost & Found One Night Stand Robusto is a small batch release cigar that is part of the Lost&Found project, which was founded by Robert Caldwell and Jaclyn Sears of Caldwell Cigars and Tony Bellatto of La Barba Cigars. This is a 2016 vintage cigar that has been carefully aged. It is a Dominican puro with a savory red-hued Colorado wrapper.Â
